name: Crocodoc, Inc.
description: Provider of tool to view and comment on PDF, Word document, and PowerPoint presentation. The company provides a tool to upload and convert them into (Hyper Text Mark-up Language) HTML5 so that you can easily embed them on web site. It also provide mark-up, share and review documents and presentations.
one_liner: Provider of tool to view and comment on PDF, Word document, and PowerPoint presentation. The company provides a tool to upload and convert them into (Hyper Text Mark-up Language) HTML5 so that you can easily embed them on web site. It also provide mark-up, share and review documents and presentations.
